#summary OSID Service Bus Wiki - home page

= Introduction =

Welcome to the OSID Service Bus wiki site.  Please use these pages to document ideas, suggestions, diagrams, etc. relating to the idea of a service bus based on OSIDs.  In addition to being language independent, [requirements] include support for messages, transactions, discovery, and federation.
